casebody.data:
In re DANOLIGHT FIXTURE CO., Inc., Bankrupt. Marshal Snyder, as Trustee in Bankruptcy, Appellant. Daniel Ceppos, Appellee. No. 459. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 27, 1933. Copal Mintz, of New York City, for appellant. Harry Gittleson, of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order and judgment affirmed.
